text: Mauro's first action was to write to his revered master at Ko"then, near Leipzig, asking He told Hahnemann that he found Anglesey a strong, energetic man with a gentle and charming character, even-tempered and sedate, not easily irritated, patient and persevering, 'but he appears to despair of ever being cured.'
